```{r include=FALSE}

glimpse(volcano)
```

```{r }
# filter US data only
us_volc <- volcano %>% 
  filter(country == "United States")%>%
  filter(region == "Canada and Western USA", "Alaska", "Hawaii and Pacific Ocean")
head(us_volc)
```

```{r}
volcano %>% filter(country == "United States") %>% select("region") %>% unique()
```

```{r include=FALSE}
# load map for US
usa <- map_data("world", region = "usa")

```

```{r include=FALSE}
# map with tigris
usa_tigris <-tracts( cb = TRUE, class = "sf")
class(usa_tigris)
```

```{r}
# ridgeline plot of elevation across subregions
p1 <- ggplot() +
  geom_density_ridges_gradient(
    data = us_volc,
    aes(x = elevation, y = subregion, fill = stat(x))
  ) +
  scale_fill_viridis() +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none", 
    panel.grid = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_blank(),
    axis.text.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.x = element_blank()
  )
p1
```

```{r}
# map of volcano locations, colour coded by elevation
p2 <- ggplot() +
  geom_polygon(
    data = usa,
    aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group),
    fill = "firebrick2",
    alpha = 1) +
  geom_point(
    data = us_volc,
    aes(x = longitude, y = latitude, colour = elevation),
    ) +
  scale_color_viridis() +
  labs(
    y = "latitude",
    x = "longitude")+

  theme_void() 
p2
```
